The Pierre

AAA Five Diamond

The Pierre, A Taj Hotel has received the sought after AAA Five Diamond Award every year since 2009. Candidates for the rating undergo multiple anonymous, in-person property evaluations and a final decision by a panel of experts. Requirements include providing meticulous personalized service, extensive amenities and impeccable standards of excellence. Five Diamond hotels represent just 0.3 percent of the nearly 59,000 AAA Approved establishments.
